document.full_text: pakistan's military was ridiculed and accused of complicity in the media on tuesday after a small group of militants laid siege to a naval air base, holding out for 16 hours against about 100 commandos and rangers.
document.title: pakistan media ridicules military after attack
lines_and_colors: pakistan's military was ridiculed and accused of complicity in the media on tuesday after a small group of militants laid siege to a naval air base, holding out for 16 hours against about 100 commandos and rangers.
